description.english: Heavy, lethal and rounded. Ideal to strike down molochs on your path.
Quite elegant, with this hammer you treat molochs like if they were drums. Beat them!
With this shamisen hammer you can play your favorite song: "Molochs go home".
to look like the god of thunder and hit like the man of steel it's all you need.
Made of ancient wood, elegantly carved, ready to strike big bad guys. What else?
For Starter, the finest Knuckles Punch in the land - only good for simple enemies!
Ideal for fighting the bad guys, to let them feel the power of a real big cat of steel. MEOW!
Nothing lasts forever - the wiseman said - except the almighty samurai blade!
Heavy katana for heavy fights.
This one it is a dangerous toothpick, do some cleaning.
Sting like a bee! Be like a sting. This hurts!
It looks like a bat with a cherry on top, and can crush open the void shrines!
With this juicy and magic skewer you can destroy Void Shrines just about right!
Shredding void shrines - smoothly - with this weapon you will.
to be the king of broken void shrines you're given this elegant scepter!
Perfect to brush away any void shrine on your path!
Beat them all! - Errr I mean... - Fry them all!
Classic Metal Helm. Very Sturdy, excellent protection, gives you additional 4 life cubes... but Crap wear Resistance.
No additional life cubes with these iron shoes, but having this stylish item on while running is priceless.
The excellence - elite of the defense outfit, probably expensive, but the wiseman knows - cost and expense are two different things - if you know what I mean.
Not fancy as the pads, but equally helpful to gain life and to defend yourself. Perfect example of efficiency. Have some and put it to good use, for your own good.
Pads will be pads - that's what the wiseman said once - Protective just about right, the kind of stuff a samurai wants on her/his shoulders and hips to deflect hard blows.
Another important defence layer for the samurai hero playing this game.
Might be ugly, might be green, but it's a classic and is going to scare the hell out from your enemies. Stylish and extremely resistent, unbreakable stuff you have here!
Classic Metal Helm. The magic nature of this item helds a diamond wear resistance, but gives almost no defence. Only +1 life cube wearing it.
No additional life cubes with these fabric shoes, but having this stylish item on while running is priceless.
The excellence - elite of the defense outfit, probably expensive, but the wiseman knows - cost and expense are two different things - if you know what I mean.
Not fancy as the pads, but equally helpful to gain life and to defend yourself. Perfect example of efficiency. Have some and put it to good use, for your own good.
Pads will be pads - that's what the wiseman said once - Protective just about right, the kind of stuff a samurai wants on her/his shoulders and hips to deflect hard blows.
another important defence layer for the samurai hero playing this game.
Wearing this colorful "thing", whatever it is, you'll become the only unicorn samurai of the land! Don't miss it! Stylish and extremely resistent, unbreakable stuff you have!
Classic wooden Helm. Wearing it will give you additional 3 life cubes, with poor wear resistance.
No additional life cubes with these wooden shoes, but having this stylish item on while running is priceless.
The excellence - elite of the defense outfit, probably expensive, but the wiseman knows - cost and expense are two different things - if you know what I mean.
Not fancy as the pads, but equally helpful to gain life and to defend yourself. Perfect example of efficiency. Have some and put it to good use, for your own good.

another important defence layer for the samurai hero playing this game.
Stylish and extremely resistent, unbreakable stuff you have here to protect your head!
Classic leather Helm. High wear resistance, it will last longer, but will protect less, only 2 life cubes added wearing this item.
No additional life cubes with these leather shoes, but having this stylish item on while running is priceless.
The excellence - elite of the defense outfit, probably expensive, but the wiseman knows - cost and expense are two different things - if you know what I mean.

"Ar! Ar! Ar! I wanna be a mighty pirate!" - and now you can - wear this Old salt hat and so be it!  Stylish and extremely resistent, unbreakable stuff you have here!
This helm made of special nano-lead will protect your brain from the poisonus radiating vapors.
Special nano-lead shoes necessary to save your feet from frying like eggs...
Your heart is in the right place, protected under a thick shell made of nano-lead!
Pads will be pads - always - even surrounded by radiations.
Additional protection never hurts in time like these.
Additional protection for your arms, shield against the poisonus radiating vapors.
